DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect internet-administered , therapist-assisted physical exercise program treatment depression .
DOC.detailed_description: Previous research find promising result regard physical exercise treatment depression . This study test 9 week , internet-administered , therapist-assisted physical exercise program .
DOC.criteria: Satisfy DSMIV criterion depression Living Sweden able read Swedish Access computer internet connection Currently receive psychological treatment Nonstable use psychoactive medication Deemed suffer severe depression , suicidal Deemed suffer psychological disorder , e.g . psychosis , bipolarity etc .
